profile_positions.title: Project development (green) molecule plants

profile_positions.description:
2020 - present
Hydrogen-Oxy Fuel combustion - HyAPC
Developing HyAPC power plant. Expectation to be commercially deployed between 2025-2030. For more information see patent application HyAPC and/or presentation HyAPC below;

2022 - present
Metal Powder Zero CO2 Emission Heat Production - Metalot
Metalot is spin-out Technical University Eindhoven which developed system to produce heat (at moments no renewable electricity is available) for industry or residential areas by oxidizing metal powder. After oxidation metal powder needs to be regenerated using green hydrogen. My role is advising Metalot to integrate their system with green hydrogen production systems like SOEC, AEM, PEM or alkaline and to facilitate the cooperation process with green hydrogen technology development companies. Info: www.metalot.nl;    

2018 - 2022
TNO/Voltachem 
Technology development projects are shown in the TNO-Voltachem experience paragraph below

2015 - 2016
Brightlands Chemelot Campus
Stakeholder management and defining roll-out operational & commercial model for the multi-purpose pilot plant. More information in Brightlands experience paragraph below.
profile_positions.title: Technology Development Specialist

profile_positions.description:
2021 - present
Advisor Power-2-X projects (Worldwide). Examples:
•	Advising McDermott to initiate and develop pre-FEED, FEED and ECP 100MW - 2GW green H2/NH3 projects (Europe, USA, Latin America, Africa and Australia);
•	Investment banks to assess e-fuel projects in European Union and developing countries;
•	Advising various companies about green H2/NH3 etc.

2022 - present
CONFIDENTIAL FERTILIZER TRADER (LATIN AMERICA)
•	Advising to acquire equity stake/long term offtake agreement fertilizer plant in Latin America;
•	Strategic advisor ammonia and urea.

2018 - 2022
TNO/Voltachem (Netherlands)
Technology development projects are shown in the TNO-Voltachem experience paragraph below

2020 - 2021
Methanol, kerosene & DME production from biogenic/cement plant CO2 (Iberian Peninsula, France, Germany)
•	Support cement producer from Iberian Peninsula to define best technical solution/business case to convert CO2 in molecules like DME, kerosene or methanol (together with TNO);
•	Market/technology assessment to support for project developer (Scandinavia/France) interested in green MeOH plants in France & Germany.

2018 - 2021
Industrial Sugar production plant (Chile)
Creating roadmap to define best option for waste wood. Example producing industrial sugar which is future feedstock new chemicals with the objective to develop industrial plants;

2017 - 2019
Pemex ammonia plant (Mexico)
Development alternative approach to use the natural gas (diluted with N2) from Cantarell oil field to produce H2 for existing ammonia & petrochemical plants in Coatzacoalcos (Mexico);

2018 - 2019
Azomures Fertilizers (Romania) 
Advising how to improve energy efficiency ammonia/fertilizer plants;
 
2014 - 2015
NEM Energy (Netherlands) & CONFIDENTIAL (Mexico)
Creating licensor/licensee partnership agreement to manufacture power plant (HRSG) equipment;

2008 - 2009
Interim project management manager Vattenfall / Nuon (Netherlands)
Head of Business Process Improvement – Project Management;

profile_positions.description: Initiating and developing green hydrogen projects/propositions/business models in new markets (outside the Netherlands) for HyCC. HyCC is a hydrogen supplier selling green hydrogen to its customers. In order to do so HyCC develops green hydrogen plants based upon alkaline/PEM (and in future SOEC and AEM) electrolyser systems, plants that HyCC is going to operate in order to produce the hydrogen for its clients.

profile_positions.location: Europe, Latin America, Africa and Asia
profile_positions.description:
UNOPS supports the successful implementation of its partners’ peacebuilding, humanitarian and development projects around the world. Its mission is to serve people in need by expanding the ability of the United Nations, governments and other partners to manage projects, infrastructure and procurement in a sustainable and efficient manner.

With over 7,000 personnel spread across 80 countries, UNOPS offers its partners the logistical, technical and management knowledge they need, wherever they need it.

A flexible structure and global reach means that UNOPS can quickly respond to its partners' needs, while offering the benefits of economies of scale.
profile_positions.title: Expert Advisory Services Public Infrastructure, Project Management & Procurement (Roster)

profile_positions.description: Bilfinger-Tebodin lost market share in the (petro)chemical industry. My task was repositioning Bilfinger-Tebodin with petrochemical and fertilizer companies in the Netherlands, Belgium, Germany and Scandinavian countries and to get the company involved with new generation circular chemicals and renewable energy companies.
profile_positions.title: Interim Business & Project Development Manager (BA2C Europe / Latin America assignment)

profile_positions.description:
Brightlands Chemelot Campus, Inscite, DSM, SABIC, Province Limburg, University Maastricht, Technical University Eindhoven (Netherlands) developed a multi-purpose pilot plant with the objective to create a center of excellence for new generation technologies on Brightlands, attract high value business activities, support new innovative start-ups with the scale-up of their technologies and to provide a pilot plant where InScite (research, development and innovation center for companies and institutes on Chemelot) could scale-up their technologies. 

My role was stakeholder management of the parties involved, to define and roll-out operational & commercial model for the multi-purpose pilot plant. Objective was to create a profitable pilot plant.
profile_positions.title: Advisor Multi-purpose Pilot Plant (BA2C Europe / Latin America assignment)

profile_positions.description:
Maire Tecnimont / Stamicarbon created the project development department to gain market share for licensing and EPC in the ammonia/urea/fertilizer domain. This department evolved into two Maire Tecnimont group companies: NextChem and Met Development.

The mission of the project development department was to initiate, promote and co-develop economic sustainable and industrial-validated projects in the ammonia, urea and petrochemicals area, leveraging on the technical/industrial, commercial, financial and legal capabilities of Maire Tecnimont Group.

In this role, I and my colleagues of Stamicarbon/Tecnimont dealt with the technical, cost-economic and financial structuring of projects with the possibility to participate as a minority equity shareholder. I dealt with the projects in sub-saharan Africa and Latin America.

Due to the knowledge of both equity and debt capital markets of me and my colleagues the Stamicarbon project development department was able to access non-traditional funding and support the best capital structure for the projects we wanted to develop.

Next to my project development role, within Stamicarbon I also dealt assessing new technologies (to be acquired). As well I managed a project where Stamicarbon and other parties in value chain (metal producers, equipment manufacturers and ammonia licensing companies) to develop a standardized ammonia/urea plant concept with the objective to shorten the engineering and construction time of an ammonia/urea plant.
profile_positions.title: Project Development Manager (BA2C Europe / Latin America assignment)

volunteer_experiences.description:
Bewoners Rondom het Plein is an organisation that represents the people who live in the city centre of The Hague towards stakeholders living and working in the area around the Plein in The Hague. 

Main stakeholders: People who live in the centre of The Hague, Municipality The Hague, Dutch Parliament & Nieuwspoort, Haagse Entree (shops), bars & restaurants around the Plein, Haags Historisch Museum, Mauritshuis and the Ministry of Defence.
